titles.title: An original resolution relating to the reimbursement of expenses paid to witnesses appearing before the Senate.

calendar.text: Committee on Rules ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on Rules. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Ford. With written report No. 100-131.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 267.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 7/28/1987--Introduced. Authorizes the reimbursement of per diem expenses of witnesses appearing before the Senate or Senate committees for travel to and from the place of examination and for each day in attendance. Repeals S. Res. 538, 96th Congress, which provided for reimbursements for such witnesses.
